explore_storage.speaker: Narrator
explore_storage.text: Following your mother's letter, you descend into the storage cellar. Between dusty crates and old furniture, something catches your eye...

find_nest.speaker: Narrator
find_nest.text: A nest of soft blankets, carefully arranged. In its center sits a large, warmly glowing egg. It pulses gently with inner light.

egg_discovery.speaker: Narrator
egg_discovery.text: A dragon egg! Your mother's greatest secret. It seems to respond to your presence, the glow brightening slightly.

touch_egg.speaker: Narrator
touch_egg.text: The shell is warm under your fingertips. You feel a faint vibration, like a tiny heartbeat. Something stirs within.

speak_to_egg.speaker: You
speak_to_egg.text: Hello there, little one. I'm going to take care of you now.

egg_responds.speaker: Narrator
egg_responds.text: The egg rocks slightly, as if acknowledging you. A bond begins to form - one that will change your life forever.

end_discovery.speaker: Mother
end_discovery.text: (In a letter left beside the nest) 'Feed it well, treat it kindly, and it will be the most loyal companion you could ever have. The food you serve shapes who it becomes.'
